member.name: T:DPosFunctionTool.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:DPosFunctionTool.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:DPosFunctionTool.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:DPosFunctionTool.modGlobal.GetMacAddress
member.summary: This function gets the mac address of the current computer.
member.returns: a string containing the mac address of the current computer.

member.name: M:DPosFunctionTool.modGlobal.GetMacAddressOfIPEnabled
member.summary: This function gets the mac address of the current adapter that is enabled when the ethernet adapter is not present.
member.returns: a string containing the mac address of the current computer.

member.name: M:DPosFunctionTool.modGlobal.GetSHA256(System.String)
member.summary: Hashes the given string using SHA256 encryption.
member.returns: the string hashed using SHA256 encryption.
